CustomField.formula: "&solmgr=1" & "&Id="& Id & "&QueryId=[AccOppty]a0p0L00000JSOkK?pv0="& AccountId & ","& "[AccTrans]a0pL0000007q6ERIAY?pv0="& AccountId & "~pv1%3D"& IF($Setup.Client_Summary_Report__c.Type_of_Loan__c = '', "'Facility Loan'|'Lump-Sum'|'Treatment Loan'|'Treatment Loan 2'|'Assessment'|'Lawyer Loan'", $Setup.Client_Summary_Report__c.Type_of_Loan__c) & ","& "[AccOutStandingBal]a0pL0000007q6EWIAY?pv0="& AccountId & "~pv1%3D"& IF($Setup.Client_Summary_Report__c.Type_of_Loan__c = '', "'Facility Loan'|'Lump-Sum'|'Treatment Loan'|'Treatment Loan 2'|'Assessment'|'Lawyer Loan'", $Setup.Client_Summary_Report__c.Type_of_Loan__c) & "&TemplateId=" & IF( ISPICKVAL( Account.Business_Unit__c , "Rhino") , "a0x0L00000PH6HP", IF( ISPICKVAL( Account.Business_Unit__c , "Seahold"), "a0x0L00000QCQoEQAX", "a0x0L00000PVUC7")) & "&DefaultPDF=1" & "&attachmentparentid=" & AccountId & "&ac0=1" & "&sc0=1" & "&sc1=SalesforceFile" & "&DS7=5" & "&qmode=Attachments"
